title: MyRadar Weather Radar Ad Free
summary: Real-time weather radar with temperatures, warnings, hurricanes, and widgets
description: MyRadar Ad Free is the ad-free version of the leading free radar app, MyRadar.It is a fast, easy-to-use, no-frills application that displays animated weather radar around your current location, allowing you to see quickly what weather is coming your way. Just start the app, and your location pops up with animated weather!The map has the standard pinch/zoom capability which allows you to smoothly zoom and pan around the United States and see what the weather is like anywhere.MyRadar shows animated weather, so you can tell if rain is headed toward or away from you, and how fast.In addition to the free features of the app, a few additional in app purchases are available including real-time hurricane tracking - great for the start of hurricane season - as well as a professional radar pack, which enables more detailed views of individual radar stations.Download MyRadar today and try it out!
descriptionHTML:
MyRadar Ad Free is the ad-free version of the leading free radar app, MyRadar.

It is a fast, easy-to-use, no-frills application that displays animated weather radar around your current location, allowing you to see quickly what weather is coming your way. Just start the app, and your location pops up with animated weather!

The map has the standard pinch/zoom capability which allows you to smoothly zoom and pan around the United States and see what the weather is like anywhere.

MyRadar shows animated weather, so you can tell if rain is headed toward or away from you, and how fast.

In addition to the free features of the app, a few additional in app purchases are available including real-time hurricane tracking - great for the start of hurricane season - as well as a professional radar pack, which enables more detailed views of individual radar stations.

Download MyRadar today and try it out!
comments: Not sure what this "Star citizen mode" fix was but it did nothing to fix not opening properly on Android 6.01 note 4. Usually crashes. Give back 5 stars addressed, until then I must use another as this is useless.

Does not load entire view of map alot of it is blacked out have to exit app and reopen to get entire view 1/26/2016 Still does not load entire map only small square rest is blacked out/3-2-2018 Ariel view is just black after last update!!!/3/04/2018 still a black screen after 2nd update!!!

The ability to see the wind and temperature patterns is very real. The northern hurricanes I've been watching were vividly verified in Nova Scotia on Christmas day when one of these swirls parked over Halifax and blew down trees and powerlines. Global warming is all too real.  There is room for improvement with the app but the data is easy to understand and it explains a lot of changes in process with the environment.

Awesome app and one that I have paid for on all my devices.  As a frequent traveler, the aviation layers are indispensable and the new features including airport delays and flight plans is invaluable.

"Chance of precipitation..."  How about be specific and mention the type of precipitation like snow, rain, sleet, freezing rain, maybe?  Another update, still doesn't show precipitation type...  I've determined that the developers are idiots.
One button away from viewing Mars? Seriously maybe a 3-5 options in. From time to time I click on the Mars it's stupid!
recentChanges: Fixes a bug in the Star Citizen modes.
